description: Defines the event fields our system recognizes as a refund event
title: Refund Event Fields Schema

$eref.description: The ISO currency code used in this purchase
$eref.title: Currency

$eref.description: Shipping cost associated with the transaction
$eref.title: Shipping Cost

$eref.description: Revenue with discounts and coupons added in
$eref.title: Purchase Total

$eref.description: Total tax associated with the transaction
$eref.title: Total Tax

$eref.description: Revenue associated with the transaction (excluding shipping and tax). This is the field we use to calculate a customer's LTV.
$eref.title: Revenue

$eref.description: The order or transaction ID associated with this purchase
$eref.title: Order ID

___order_id.description: The order or transaction ID associated with the refunded purchase
___order_id.title: Refunded Order ID

$eref.description: Store or affiliation from which this transaction occurred (e.g. Google Store)
$eref.title: Affiliation
